title: Long Time, No Play
body:
I haven't played LoL in over a year, is it worth re-installing?
I only liked ARAM, didn't like the rift since season 2-3.

Have 10cent fully destroyed the game or does it still have merit?

replies.body:
Na its still fine to play. Its very fair when you compare to dota. You dont have to read into it as much. 
I've been playing since beta and still am having fun with it. I havnt got any better, but its still fun. I dont know why i enjoy it so much..

Take it from me, I've played the game on and off for over 8-9 years now. And honestly the game is in perhaps the best shape/meta it's ever been. Plus only about to get better with a ton of new season overhauling to start this year off. Also interestingly enough I run one of the largest ARAM clubs on OCE and have a strong network with most ARAM clubs also on OCE, so feel free to add me in game.
